name: Senior Backend Engineer
description:
At Arrival, our team is creating best-in-class electric vehicles using a radical new method of design and production. We work with some of the world's leading businesses and governments to achieve our goal of redefining mobility and transport ecosystems, transforming how people and goods travel and enhancing urban environments for all communities.

Innovation, rapid development and testing help us to push the boundaries. Our New Method takes our portfolio of patented technologies created in-house, and combines it with assembly in Arrival Microfactories. It’s a groundbreaking approach, leading to products with maximum functionality, peak efficiency, and an elevated experience – at a much more competitive price than other electric vehicles, and even fossil fuel vehicles.

Rent Studio is a web application that helps Mobility operations team to manage operations caused by customer interaction with Mobility services by providing necessary context and tools to solve arising tasks easily and effectively, in order to act and make decisions based on the most relevant data, delivering the best experience to the customers.

Now we're looking for Senior Backend Engineer.

What you will do:

  • Design and Developing a new features from scratch
  • Participate in all phases of development (including design and architecture)
  • Write clean, maintainable code, follow team guidelines
  • Conduct code reviews, take a part in Architecture decisions
  • Experimenting with new technologies to keep our tech stack up to date
  • Writing integration tests

Expertise:

  • Hands-on experience in Backend development with Java
  • Solid knowledge of Java Platform
  • Solid knowledge of Spring Boot (Spring Cloud)
  • Solid knowledge of Algorithms and Data Structures
  • Experience in multithreaded application development
  • Experience in Database development (SQL)
  • Be familiar with Kubernetes
  • Understanding the principles of microservice architecture
  • Experience with CI/CD, Automation tools and strong testing practices

What we offer:

  • To join highly scientific-intensive culture and take part in developing the unique product.
  • Flexible working environment - choose your working hours and equipment.
  • 28 days’ paid annual leave per year.
  • Medical Insurance from the first week of work.
  • Compensation for sports and English lessons.
  • Breakfast, soft drinks, juices, snacks in Office.
  • Latest technology to do your impactful work with
